title: Extra Large Webster / Lincoln Park Apt Available Sept 1
posting_body: *** LEASE IS FLEXIBLE - IDEALLY SEPT 1- MAY 31 2023, BUT ROOM FOR NEGOTIATION MINIMUM 6 MO MAX 1 YEAR.
One-of-a-kind Lincoln Park 3 Bedroom 2 Bath apartment set amongst a quiet tree-lined street in a quaint four-unit 3 story building offering an expansive extra-wide floor plan.
This unit itself is particularly great if you desire a larger living area.
2000 square foot apartments for rent are a rare find in the city!
High, 11'+ ceilings in the living area give the room an expansive, open feel, with wall to wall windows overlooking the tree-lined Webster Ave.
The unit features hardwood flooring throughout, 3 large bedrooms including a 20x18 extra large master bedroom with a walk-in closet.
Premier location walking distance to Chicago's lakefront, parks, grocery, boutique shops, Lincoln Park Zoo, Depaul University, public transportation, and some of the city's best restaurants and bars.
Luxury shopping, dining, and retail located all over Armitage Ave and Webster.
Located across the street from Trebes Park.
Very nice neighborhood nestled in between Seminary Ave and Clifton Ave, surrounded by multi-million dollar homes on either side.
Open to renting with or without furniture.
As for the terms of the lease, we are flexible, ideally it would start Sept 1 and run til end of April or May, but we are open to different start and end dates.
